Colloidal synthesis as a mature method has previously been widely used to synthesize inorganic quantum dots (QDs). 48 Schmidt et al. first synthesized MAPbBr 3 QD colloidal dispersions, which resulted in high luminescence and good dispersion due to the surface ligand capping. 49 Recently, a number of 2D perovskites have been obtained by this method.
